rows.label: tev001292_MSG0001
rows.name: This little pup seemed lonely, so I took him for a walk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0002
rows.name:
He wouldn't stop licking my face, and now it's all
sticky and gross. Plus it smells like jerky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0003
rows.name:
But that's okay because he's SO DARN CUTE!
The BLADE barracks are way more fun now
that he's around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: tev001292_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree that he's made coming home more fun.

rows.label: tev001292_JNK0020
rows.name: Gripe

rows.label: tev001292_SEL0021
rows.name: Complain about how much work it is to care for him.

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0004
rows.name: Yeah, and I think he loves being here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0005
rows.name:
Have you seen how hard his little tail wags when you
come home?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0006
rows.name:
That just shows how much you care about the
little guy, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0007
rows.name:
I mean, you do everything from grooming him to
brushing his teeth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0008
rows.name:
You must really love him lots to be able to do all that.
It's really sweet, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0009
rows.name: Hey, I have an ideaâ€”tricks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0010
rows.name:
I bet you'd be a great teacher, right? And it'll be easy
with a student who's so eager to impress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0011
rows.name:
Okay, so what trick do you want to start with?
I guess shaking hands would be the most basic,
but I'll leave it up to the master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_JNK0030
rows.name: Teach Shake

rows.label: tev001292_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer the dog your hand and say "shake!"

rows.label: tev001292_JNK0040
rows.name: Teach Flips

rows.label: tev001292_SEL0041
rows.name: Show the dog how to do a flip in midair.

rows.label: tev001292_JNK0050
rows.name: Teach Lin

rows.label: tev001292_SEL0051
rows.name: Offer Lin your hand and say "shake!"

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0012
rows.name: Aw, he looks so confused! That's so cute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0013
rows.name:
If we really want him to learn it, we'll have to train
him every day and reward him with treats.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0014
rows.name:
Let's stay on top of this and make sure he learns.
He seems pretty smart, so I bet he'll pick it up fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0015
rows.name:
Wow, that's ambitious. But I love it! Skells, dogs,
and everything else should all be able to fly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0016
rows.name:
But if that's what we're doing, we might need to bring
in the big guns. I'll talk to someone I know who used
to be a professional dog trainer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0017
rows.name:
If you're really determined to teach him an expert-level
trick like that, you better study up a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0018
rows.name:
It won't be easy, but between the two of us, I bet
we'll have this pooch soaring through the skies
before you know it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0019
rows.name: Hah! I'm getting excited at just the thought![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0021
rows.name: NOT ME! THE DOG![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0022
rows.name:
Seriously? Is that how you think of me?
Like I'm just some...some PET?!
This is unforgivable, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001292_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Until you buy me a crepe from Rosemoss, that is.
Then I might be able to forget this ever happened.[ST:wait ]
